data.message: i wish my cousins samantha jo sapp and seth smallwood would learn to do this on their fb accts.  if u dont want anyone to know ur business, dont put ur business on fb in the first place.

replies.message: I agree this is a free service that provides a tool to stay in touch with family friends and use at your discretion so how you use is your choice. If you don't want anyone to know your business then don't put it where the world can see it. If you don't like the free service with unlimited benefits. Don't use.
